channel.title: CVE Feed for Recruit Co., Ltd. -- "Rikunabi NEXT" App for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Recruit Co., Ltd. -- "Rikunabi NEXT" App for Android

item.title: CVE-2023-39507|2024-08-02T18:10:21.413Z -- recruit%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- %22rikunabi%20next%22%20app%20for%20android
item.description: Improper authorization in the custom URL scheme handler in "Rikunabi NEXT" App for Android prior to ver. 11.5.0 allows a malicious intent to lead the vulnerable App to access an arbitrary website.
